file.name: api-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '1'
  title: InferenceAPI
  description: API for ML
paths: 
  /predict:
    post:
      description: This is the way to predict
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                input:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    Image:
                      type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully returned model prediction
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  output:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      predictions:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            confidence:
                              type: number
                            label:
                              type: string

        '400':
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:   
                  message:
                    type: string
